mapper.delete:
delete from t_admin_menu where menu_id in
#{item}
mapper.select: select menu_id ,menu_name ,menu_url ,valid_flag ,sort_id ,menu_type ,create_date ,update_date ,parent_id ,icon ,search_flag ,delete_flag ,update_flag ,add_flag ,batch_delete_flag from t_admin_menu where menu_id = #{menuId} order by sort_id ,create_date desc limit 1;
